entry.name: Prompt Message
entry.description: Message displayed in dialog box that prompts action. (e.g. 'Open').

entry.name: Failure Message
entry.description: Message displayed in dialog box upon failed action. (e.g. 'Its locked').

entry.name: Flag for Automatic Success
entry.description: Action will always be successful if this flag is enabled.

entry.name: Player Action Animation
entry.description: Animation played by a player character when they successfully activate the object.

entry.name: Character Action Animation
entry.description: Animation played by a non-player character when they successfully activate the object.

entry.name: Max Action Distance
entry.description: Maximum distance from action model point at which the object action will be prompted.

entry.name: Object Action Model Point
entry.description: Model point that specifies where the action occurs on the object (for snapping the player and distance check).

entry.name: Object Action Animation
entry.description: Animation played by the object when it is successfully activated.

entry.name: Max Player Angle
entry.description: Maximum angle between the character's forward direction and the direction to the object action point for the action prompt to appear.

entry.name: Success Condition 1 Type
entry.description: Type of success condition for Success Condition 1.

entry.name: Success Condition 2 Type
entry.description: Type of success condition for Success Condition 2.

entry.name: Max Object Angle
entry.description: Maximum angle between the object's forward direction and the direction to the player for the action prompt to appear.

entry.name: Character Snap Type
entry.description: Type of method used to snap the character to the object before animations are played.

entry.name: Event Trigger Delay
entry.description: Delay between successful object activation and the outgoing success trigger used by game events.

entry.name: Action Button Param
entry.description: The Action Button param to used when this object is activated.
